resources.string: The episode cache limit has been reached, you can adjust the limit in the Settings

Total size of episodes on the device
Number of new and unplayed episodes
Number of downloaded and unplayed episodes
This will clear the entire playback history. Are you sure you want to proceed?
No external storage is available. Please make sure that external storage is mounted so that the app can work properly.
Send a notification when a new episode is released
Please confirm to mark all episodes as played.
Please confirm to mark all episodes in this podcast as played.
Please confirm to unsubscribe the podcast \"%1$s\" , all the episodes will be deleted.
Please confirm to unsubscribe the podcasts, all the episodes will be deleted.
Please confirm to remove the podcast \"%1$s\". The files in the local source folder will not be deleted.
Please wait until the data is loaded
Refreshing podcasts over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings.\n\nDo you want to refresh anyway?
Unable to delete file. Reboot the device could help.
To jump to the position, you need to play the episode first
There is not enough space left on your device.
Looks like this is a website, not a podcast
The episode may have been removed
Please check if the address is correctly and the network connection is valid
There was a problem with the podcast service, please try again later
Download interrupted, please try again later
The download was blocked by another app on your device (like a VPN or ad blocker)
Unable to establish a secure connection. This can mean that another app on your device (like a VPN or an ad blocker) blocked the download, or that something is wrong with the server certificates.
Confirm that you want to delete downloaded file?
No podcast was provided that could be shown.
The resource you requested requires a username and a password

Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled.
You can choose to either only add the episode to the playlist or you can allow downloading temporarily.

Your choice will be remembered for 10 minutes.

Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled.
Do you want to allow downloading temporarily?

Your choice will be remembered for 10 minutes.
Streaming over mobile data connection is disabled. Tap to stream anyway.
Item does not contain a media file
If you lock the playlist, you can not swipe or reorder episodes
Please confirm to clear the queue of ALL of the episodes in it
%1$.2fx is already saved as a preset.
Let\'s find some episodes for your playlist
You haven\'t downloaded any episodes yet
You have not favorited any episodes
Try the Discover button at the bottom to get your favorite podcasts in your pocket
Old episodes that should be deleted when auto-download finds insufficient space
Pause playback when wired Headphone or bluetooth are disconnected
Resume playback when the wired Headphone are reconnected
Continue to the next episode in the playlist after an episode is complete
Add extra controls for mini player
It will only be displayed in dark mode
Delete episodes after playback is complete
Mark an episode as played when the remaining unplayed time is less than the set value
Keep episodes when they are skipped
Keep episodes when they are marked favorite
Specify an interval or a specific time to automatically refresh the podcast
Allowed operations when using the mobile network
Playback controls and Custom playback interface
Auto update, Auto download, Mobile network
Episode auto delete, Sync data with other podcast apps
As per Material Design guide lines in dark mode colors should be desaturated
The background and control button colors change according to the album art from the now playing screen
Colors the app shortcuts in the accent color. Every time you change the color please toggle this to take effect
Amount of blur applied for blur themes, lower is faster
You can choose the podcast search engine that suits you. If you choose more than one, you can search for more results, but this will make the search time longer
Change the order and visibility of the navigation drawer
Not all mobile phone support this feature, please test by yourself
Change the order of your subscriptions
Change the count method of the episodes counter
Allow automatic download when the battery is not charging
When the total number of downloaded episodes on the device exceeds the set value, automatic downloads will be suspended
Use episode cover instead of podcast cover image
Show cover in podcast episode list
Show cover on the podcast\'s episode list screen
Display remaining time instead of duration
Change the login information for your gpodder.net account.

Logged in as %1$s on %2$s.

You can choose your synchronization provider again once you have logged out
Select Google Drive, One Drive, Dropbox, WebDAV
Synchronize the app Settings, Subscriptions , Episodes, the app will be closed after successful recovery, please open it manually
Choose from multiple providers to synchronize subscriptions and episodes
Gpoddersync is an open source Nextcloud application that you need to deploy on your own server, if you know enough then you can continue
Grant access using the opened web browser and come back to FocusPodcast.
Re-synchronize all subscriptions and episode states
Synchronize subscription and episode state changes
Customize the speeds available for variable speed playback
Skip the beginning and the end
Adjust media info to playback speed
The playback position and duration are adjusted according to the playback speed
Customize the number of seconds to jump forward when the fast forward button is clicked
Customize the number of seconds to jump backwards when the rewind button is clicked
This usually expands the notification to show playback buttons.
Keep notification and lockscreen controls when playback is paused.
Change the playback buttons when the notification is collapsed. The play/pause button is always included
You can only select a maximum of %1$d items
Set the lockscreen background to the current episode\'s image
Where new episodes are added to the playlist: %1$s
Select which media player to use to play files
Add to playlist when download starts
Automatically add to playlist when downloading episodes
We will remember your last playback effects and use them on all podcasts. You can enable this if you want to create custom ones for just this podcast
Change behavior of the back button
Are you sure you want to close FocusPodcast?
Click the back button again to exit
Automatically remove the episode from the queue when it is deleted
Filter your subscriptions in navigation drawer and subscriptions screen.
This setting is unique to each podcast. You can change it by opening the podcast page.
When the phone is in landscape orientation, two columns are displayed, the navigation drawer on the left and the content on the right
Move subscriptions and queue to another device
Transfer your subscriptions to another podcast app
Import your subscriptions from another podcast app
Transfer subscriptions, listened episodes and queue to FocusPodcast on another device
Import FocusPodcast database from another device
An error has occurred while reading the OPML document:
Importing a database will replace all of your current subscriptions and playing history. You should export your current database as a backup. Do you want to replace?
Access to external storage is required to read the OPML file
Please press OK to restart FocusPodcast
This database was exported with a newer version of FocusPodcast. Your current installation does not yet know how to handle this file.
Invalid input, time has to be an integer
Password and data are not encrypted!
Gpodder.net is an open source podcast synchronization service that you may need to deploy on your own server, if you know enough then you can continue
Your gpodder.net account is now linked with your device. FocusPodcast will automatically sync subscriptions on your device with your gpodder.net account
Username can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores
Pause the sound when other app (like an alarm, navigation instructions etc.) wants to play the sound instead of lowering the volume
Pause playback when other app sounds
Resume playback after a phone call completes
Required only if the podcast requires authentication
Manage your subscriptions with custom tags
Show this podcast in main list
{fa-info-circle} Only common tags from all selected subscriptions are shown. Other tags stay unaffected.
Include or exclude an episode when downloading automatically
Include this podcast when automatically refreshing all podcasts
Auto download is disabled in the main FocusPodcast settings
In case of permission denials, you can use this to re-connect to the exact same folder. Do not select another folder.
This virtual podcast was created by adding a folder to FocusPodcast.
Unable to start system file manager
Host is not a valid IP address or domain
Shown if your action is required, for example if you need to enter a password.
Allows to control playback. This is the main notification you see while playing a podcast.
Shown when download or feed update fails.
Shown when episodes have been automatically downloaded.
Shown when a new episode of a podcast was found, where notifications are enabled
iTunes does not have data for the selected country.
More Themes, Now playing themes, Custom homepage, and more... to create your own unique podcast app
More themes (theme color can be adjusted arbitrarily)
Advanced playback settings (custom playback speed, volume boost, skip silence, drop mix (Mono), skip start and end for each channel)
Unlimited subscriptions (up to 100 for free version)
Custom home page, custom drawer navigation bar order and visibility
More now playing themes, more beautiful desktop widgets
Backup data to cloud storage (OneDrive, Dropbox, GoogleDrive, WebDAV)
Support developers, buy me a cup of coffee
Customize the podcast search engine and find the most suitable one from multiple search engines
Add virtual podcasts (import local audio and video, audio ebooks), benefit from advanced playback features such as silent skip, volume boost and sleep timer, all in one podcast and media player
Full text (Shownotes for full podcasts) search across all content (any playlist or subscription) to find the podcast episode you\'re looking for
The new version of FocusPodcast has been launched. recommended to update on Google Play
The maximum number of subscriptions for the free version has been reached
Maybe you want to subscribe via the copied URL, we have auto-populated the search input box for you
